description: ALBION CROSSING | 3 BED | 3 BATH | Proudly presenting this well kept, 1244 sqft town home in Albion Crossing, that will check all the boxes. LAYOUT; Open concept with seamless flow. Open kitchen to dining and living space with a powder room on the main floor, walk out deck and stairs to your fenced yard with private patio, perfect for hosting friends + family. Upstairs ftrs 3 bedrooms, primary with walk in ensuite + full second bathroom. Large 400 sqft garage with storage on the back side. FEATURES; Stainless steel appliances, quartz counter tops, white shaker cabinets, laminate flooring on the main floor + carpet up stairs. LOCATION; Historic Albion; Quiet, family friendly neighbourhood close to nature trails, Albion Elementary, Bruces Market and King Fishers River Front Restaurant!
